effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the user’s Defense by one stage.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the user’s Defense by one stage.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the user’s Defense by one stage.

short_effect.sun_moon: Lowers the user’s Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Lowers the user’s Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Lowers the user’s Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack the opposing Pokémon. The user’s Defense stat goes down after the attack.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack the opposing Pokémon. The user’s Defense stat goes down after the attack.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack the opposing Pokémon. The user’s Defense stat goes down after the attack.
